      public void initCard(Path p) throws IOException
      Create the list of Dev and Nobles cards in the game with the informations located in the file data/Cards.csv.
      Parameters:
      p - : the path for file which countain all information
      Throws:
      IOException - :an exception if the wanted file does not exist

    • updateDevTerrain

      public void updateDevTerrain(int version)
      Draw some Dev cards until the game is full.
      Parameters:
      version - : the version of the game, 0 if we only want Dev cards from Level 1 and 1 if we want all Dev cards from all Levels.

      public void select_action(Scanner scanner, int num_player, int version, fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext context, int w, int h)
      The player can choose his action between 4 possibilities.
      Parameters:
      scanner - : take the value on the terminal
      version - : version == 0 for the version phase 1 of the game and version == 1 for the fullgame.
      num_joueur - number of the actual player

    • win
